About Us
Navarre Beach
Navarre Beach
Navarre Beach Camping Resort is Northwest Florida’s “best-kept vacation secret.”
With beautiful unspoiled white sandy beaches and emerald-colored water, we are just 45 miles east of Perdido Key between Pensacola and Fort Walton Beach off Hwy 98. Enjoy our private beach on the Santa Rosa Sound or drive to the Gulf Beaches just 5 minutes away. We offer quality RVing at a highly rated 9/10/10 Good Sam park. We feature waterfront sites on Santa Rosa Sound, a pier, heated pool, hot tub, beach, spacious pull-thru sites with patios, 50-amp service, free cable TV, shaded paved roads, sparkling clean restrooms, and limited access gate.
Elevating this slice of paradise, Navarre Beach Camping Resort is proudly managed by IVEE, renowned for their commitment to excellence in outdoor hospitality. IVEE’s philosophy of ‘Improving Value and Enhancing Experiences’ resonates through every aspect of our resort. From meticulously maintained amenities to bespoke guest services, IVEE’s touch ensures that your stay at Navarre Beach is not just a getaway, but a journey into a world where nature’s beauty meets unparalleled service. Their expertise in creating memorable stays is evident in the seamless blend of natural splendor and comfort that our guests cherish.
Under IVEE’s stewardship, Navarre Beach Camping Resort stands as a testament to exceptional campground and RV park management. This partnership enriches the guest experience, ensuring that every visit is imbued with the warmth, quality, and attention to detail that IVEE and Navarre Beach are celebrated for. As you explore other IVEE-managed properties, you’ll discover this same commitment to excellence, making each park a destination worth visiting. From the serene whispers of nature to the echoes of laughter around a campfire, IVEE ensures that every moment spent at their parks is a treasure waiting to be uncovered.
Book Now!
Professionally Managed By

Ways to Stay
ways to stay
Ways to stay
Navarre Beach Camping Resort is the place for your Florida Gulf Coast Vacation! We provide a great escape as one of the highest rated RV parks in the area.
RV SITES AND CABINS
RV SITES AND CABINS
RV SITES
Show more
CABINS
Show More
RV SITES
Show more
CABINS
Show More
Navarre Beach Camping Resort is the place for your Florida Gulf Coast Vacation! We provide a great escape as one of the highest rated RV parks in the area.
All RV site rates are based on two people, one RV, and one vehicle. Additional people are $5  per night, per person.  Additional vehicles are $5 per night, per site. An additional fee of $10 will be charged each night for Friday and Saturday. There is no charge for children under the age of 4. Rates are subject to change.
Watercraft up to 23ft are permitted but you must call to make a reservation for the watercraft in advance. The fee is $45 per stay, under 7 nights for all watercraft.
Pet-Friendly Cabins: We offer a variety of pet-friendly cabins,
you can select pet-friendly options when making your reservation online or contact the office with any questions. There is a $25 one-time pet fee for each pet. This is non-refundable and there is a three pet maximum.
Cabins do not come with linens, there is a one-time $20 fee if you would like to rent them from us. They included bed linens and bath towels.
Holiday stays require a 3-night minimum. A minimum 3-night deposit is also required at the time of booking.
